# Critics' Choice Super Award for Best Actor in a Superhero Movie

The '''Critics' Choice Super Award for Best Actor in a Superhero Movie' is an award presented by the Critics Choice Association to the best performance by an actor in a superhero film.
This award was first presented in 2021 to Ewan McGregor for his role as Roman Sionis / Black Mask on Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn).
The current recipient of the award is Hugh Jackman for his role as Logan / Wolverine in Deadpool & Wolverine.
